title: Pixel 3a No Thumbnails when connecting to PC
content:
Photo thumbnails do not show up when the phone is connected to PC via USB (windows)

It has worked when I bought the phone, now it does not. All settings on my computer are correct.

This is a basic thing we all need.

Extremely frustrating as other people report the same problem and there is no solution.
This phone was dedicated to the camera and taking pictures and now we can not view them.......
